title: I dream of peace and rest: Norman Lindsay
brief_description: The opening of Norman Lindsay’s house by the National Trust. The house exhibits work by Norman Lindsay, including sculpture in the gardens. Lindsay’s thoughts and reflections on his life and work are heard, and many of his works of art are shown. Narrated by Margaret Throsby and Don Reid.
